landing.description: Do you need to transport or store your cargo under certain environmental conditions? Then you've come to the right place. With the help of the service, you can independently configure all the necessary environmental indicators.
landing.card1Body: Our service uses the latest vehicles to transport your goods. Besure that your cargo will arrive at the appointed time safe and sound.
landing.card2Body: You set the conditions under which you need to transfer or save the cargo. At any time, you can track the condition of your cargo.
landing.card3Body: In addition to the transportation of goods, our service also provides their storage. As with transportation, you yourself indicate all the necessary environmental parameters.

registration.passwordsNotEqual: Password and confirm password must be equal.
registration.weakPassword: Passwords must have 6 characters and at least one non alphanumeric character, one lowercase ('a'-'z'), one uppercase ('A'-'Z').

emailConfirmation.success: Your email has been successfully confirmed.

toastrs.registration: You are registered successfully. Confirmation email was send to

cargoRequest.header: Create a request for the transportaion or storage of cargo
cargoRequest.securityModeToolTip: Check this if you want to enable additional security mode for cargo storing
